channel.title: Comments on: Tears in Rain
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: i haven't seen any of these movies, except the original balde runner and ghostbusters and batman begins and the original indiana jones movies, on vhs no less. but i want to see all of them. and, of course, i can't remember a thing about the original, so i'll need to watch it again too. HD this time for sure. as for ratatouille, which i noticed got booted off the list, i have tried to watch it almost 20 different times, but somehow can't seem to ever watch it from start to finish. but melissa likes it.
item.content:encoded: i haven’t seen any of these movies, except the original balde runner and ghostbusters and batman begins and the original indiana jones movies, on vhs no less. but i want to see all of them. and, of course, i can’t remember a thing about the original, so i’ll need to watch it again too. HD this time for sure. as for ratatouille, which i noticed got booted off the list, i have tried to watch it almost 20 different times, but somehow can’t seem to ever watch it from start to finish. but melissa likes it.
